name: ClassDojo
headline: Communication app for K-8 teachers, kids, and families
description: ClassDojo's mission is to give every kid an education they love. Our flagship communication app has become the world’s largest network serving kids, reaching over 51 million kids, families and teachers in 180 countries every month, entirely through word of mouth. They use it to share the best moments in a kid's day through pictures, videos, messages, and more. ClassDojo has recognized by Forbes, LinkedIn, Inc and Fast Company, and it is a top 100 Y Combinator company.
tags: industry:education; industry:consumer; industry:entertainment; industry:kids; industry:metaverse; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Sam Chaudhary, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO at ClassDojo. Mission is to give every kid on Earth an education they love.

Welcome to ClassDojo. Where school comes together.
The #1 communication app for K-12 schools. Used by 1 in 5 US families every week. 100% free for teachers, families and districts.
Get started as a...

Next
Turn classrooms into communities
Easy ways to involve families, share what’s happening in the classroom, and make everyone feel part of the magic.
![img](http://www.classdojo.com/static/desk-6ced0d9957fd04cc30a7ec30b4e389b0.png)
![icon](http://www.classdojo.com/static/smile-87d8681af88de3418fbc7ee1d65a8162.png)
## You’re always in control
![icon](http://www.classdojo.com/static/slide5-top-74892ff6127a5931f04a35e47deeb608.png)
Set quiet hours, keep your phone number private, remove or block unwanted chats, and access full messaging histories and records. With ClassDojo, you’re always in control.
![icon](http://www.classdojo.com/static/chat-ballon-2f0e11f354f1d8aa429363621b901a06.png)
## Instant translations in 130+ languages
![icon](http://www.classdojo.com/static/slide1-top-664b2ce1dc6f37e5330aa9c7b2aaf277.png)
Private messages and group chats for your whole school. One-way announcements with read receipts. Works on any device.
![icon](http://www.classdojo.com/static/phone-b0bace0365e470773e0913b725384e72.png)
## Share in the best moments
![icon](http://www.classdojo.com/static/slide2-top-efd631a3ae0c4fdf9126b39da99cac7e.png)
Share your favorite photos, videos and moments with a tap. Likes and comments make everyone feel connected, and views show who’s engaging.
![icon](http://www.classdojo.com/static/calendar-dc4b89a1b9e8434582d17174a534f48c.png)
## Events made effortless
![icon](http://www.classdojo.com/static/slide3-top-0fe093dd23350c15d34617fc74eab803.png)
Get more families involved with easy event planning for field trips, conferences, and more. With automatic reminders, so no one forgets.
![icon](http://www.classdojo.com/static/confetii-679d95f4f30c54047615bb407b2a2fdd.png)
## Happier classrooms, happier schools
![icon](http://www.classdojo.com/static/slide4-cropped-c44a15d15a585d2339fca5d0515e3fa1.png)
Celebrate what’s going well with positive classroom management and school points tailored to your values or PBIS program.

The whole school at your fingertips
Create your ideal school community on the platform loved by 50+ million teachers and families worldwide. Engage families, communicate with anyone, and reward positive behavior in one easy-to-use place. 
Free for schools, forever.
[Show me more](http://www.classdojo.com/</schools>)
![img](http://www.classdojo.com/static/school-fingertips@2x-7d33f655c03363a8cc334439acd35cdb.png)
![img](http://www.classdojo.com/static/districts-f7f65ae6ca49c0fe951ce0c92673a1e6.png)
One app for your entire district
ClassDojo for Districts offers district-wide communication, automatic rostering, SSO, 24/7 support, and full FERPA and COPPA compliance. All in a simple, easy-to-use platform teachers and families love. 
Free for schools and districts.
Apply for a partnership
## Trusted by millions. Certified by experts.
Schools and families are the core of ClassDojo. That’s why everything we do is designed to be private, kid-safe, and data-secure from the start. Full transparency and protection of personal information guaranteed. Our products are certified as fully compliant with COPPA and FERPA in the US by iKeepSafe, and GDPR in Europe.
![img](http://www.classdojo.com/static/coppa-2ce0ca64b721d800f2a1a2f7914da5f7.svg)![img](http://www.classdojo.com/static/gdpr-e2c7ad80d9687a7655ef5d98f45f9c11.svg)![img](http://www.classdojo.com/static/ferpa-a18046ba195c3af6825899c9dc8f8df3.svg)
[Learn more](http://www.classdojo.com/</privacy-and-security>)
## Learning experiences kids love
![img](http://www.classdojo.com/static/dojo-islands-7aef361587bca3a5af03b2e6e786ff2e.svg)
Your browser does not support the video tag.
![img](http://www.classdojo.com/static/dice@2x-cebc5e0dea3d490084d33ddaa83bfba3.png)![img](http://www.classdojo.com/static/cube@2x-df4aa6a4f9846a5942a87b4dc49ed1df.png)
Learning together through play
Dojo Islands is a magical world where kids explore STEM, teamwork, and creativity. Trusted by teachers, loved by families. Perfect for class or home use.
[Visit Dojo Islands](http://www.classdojo.com/</dojo-islands>)
![img](http://www.classdojo.com/static/mario-452fa991f494781d40175168deeafc48.png)
Dojo Tutor
![img](http://www.classdojo.com/static/bg_tutor-c4c8f5852914953f7daaf24fd6a1ad10.png)
1-to-1 attention from tutors who care
Dojo Tutor connects kids with passionate, experienced tutors for 1-to-1 support in reading and math. Classes cost just $30 and take place online, and on your schedule.
![img](http://www.classdojo.com/static/tutor-mara-f9f26433cbab08d19f1abe3c720841d3.png)
[Discover Dojo Tutor](http://www.classdojo.com/<https:/tutor.classdojo.com/>)
Big ideas for growing minds
Inspirational videos that inspire kids to talk and grow, covering topics from growth mindset to empathy.
[Explore Big Ideas](http://www.classdojo.com/<https:/ideas.classdojo.com/>)

Welcome to ClassDojo. Where school comes together.
The #1 communication app for K-12 schools. Used by 1 in 5 US families every week. 100% free for teachers, families and districts.

### Instant translations in 130+ languages
Private messages and group chats for your whole school. One-way announcements with read receipts. Works on any device.
### Share in the best moments
Share your favorite photos, videos and moments with a tap. Likes and comments make everyone feel connected, and views show who’s engaging.
### Events made effortless
Get more families involved with easy event planning for field trips, conferences, and more. With automatic reminders, so no one forgets.
### Happier classrooms, happier schools
Celebrate what’s going well with positive classroom management and school points tailored to your values or PBIS program.
### You’re always in control
Set quiet hours, keep your phone number private, remove or block unwanted chats, and access full messaging histories and records. With ClassDojo, you’re always in control.
The whole school at your fingertips
Create your ideal school community on the platform loved by 50+ million teachers and families worldwide. Engage families, communicate with anyone, and reward positive behavior in one easy-to-use place. 
Free for schools, forever.
Show me more⟨29⟩
![img⟨30⟩]
![img⟨31⟩]
One app for your entire district
ClassDojo for Districts offers district-wide communication, automatic rostering, SSO, 24/7 support, and full FERPA and COPPA compliance. All in a simple, easy-to-use platform teachers and families love. 
Free for schools and districts.
Apply for a partnership
## Trusted by millions. Certified by experts.
Schools and families are the core of ClassDojo. That’s why everything we do is designed to be private, kid-safe, and data-secure from the start. Full transparency and protection of personal information guaranteed. Our products are certified as fully compliant with COPPA and FERPA in the US by iKeepSafe, and GDPR in Europe.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: ClassDojo**

**Founding and Mission**  
ClassDojo was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco. The mission of this communication app is simple yet powerful: to give every kid an education they love. It connects K-8 teachers, students, and families across the globe. ClassDojo quickly became the world's largest network serving kids, boasting over 51 million users in 180 countries, all acquired through word of mouth.

**Key Features**  
The app is celebrated for its ability to share moments from a child's day, like pictures and videos, fostering a vibrant community among educators and families. It’s not just a communication tool; it transforms classrooms into communities by involving families and sharing classroom happenings. With features like instant translations in over 130 languages, event planning, and private messaging, ClassDojo makes learning and communication accessible for everyone.

**Recognition**  
ClassDojo's impact hasn't gone unnoticed. The company has received accolades from reputable organizations like Forbes, LinkedIn, and Fast Company, and it's recognized as a top 100 company from Y Combinator’s Batch S12. 

**Team and Culture**  
Currently, ClassDojo employs around 100 people and operates with the value of being free for teachers, families, and schools, emphasizing accessibility in education. The culture is community-driven, encouraging engagement and positive interactions among users.

**Future Directions**  
ClassDojo is continually expanding its offerings with initiatives like Dojo Islands, a platform for kids to explore STEM and creativity, and Dojo Tutor, which provides personalized online tutoring for students. The company's commitment to privacy and security is exemplary, ensuring that all interactions within the app are kid-safe and data-secure.

**Conclusion**  
With its mission of enhancing education and community participation, ClassDojo stands out as a transformative tool in K-8 education. If you haven’t already, check them out at [classdojo.com](http://www.classdojo.com) and see how they’re changing the way classrooms connect.
